name: Zimmic
description:
We build high impact applications with a strong focus on user experience.
SALESFORCE & FORCE.COM We are Salesforce Certified Developers and we build custom applications that take the force.com platform to the next level. We create astonishing user interfaces and external APIs integration.
WEB APPLICATIONS We love the web, and we like to contribute to make it a better place. We create web applications that are standards compliant on time and on budget.
Having developed on the web for several years now, and having worked with PHP, Java and ASP, our current weapon of choice is Ruby and the fantastic Rails and Sinatra frameworks.
If you like the latest technologies as we do, we can add HTML5 to create a spectacular UI.
MOBILE APPLICATIONS More and more our phones are turning into computers, and having mobile applications, whether it's web based or native code mobile apps are a must for today's users.
You have a mobile application in mind? We can build it.
You have an existing application and want to add mobile support? We can help you there too.
We can build your mobile application either native or web based.
